text: Eddie Davis (born January 27, 1973 in St. Louis, Missouri) is a former defensive halfback who played 15 seasons in the Canadian Football League, mainly with the Saskatchewan Roughriders. He played his college football for Northern Illinois University. He was often teamed one-on-one with the opposition's best receiver. The Saskatchewan Roughriders announced his retirement on February 25, 2010. On August 20, 2015, he was inducted into the Canadian Football Hall of Fame. ==External links== * Player profile of Eddie Davis Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American football defensive backs Category:American players of Canadian football Category:Birmingham Barracudas players Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Canadian football defensive backs Category:Canadian Football Hall of Fame inductees Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Northern Illinois Huskies football players Category:Sportspeople from St. Louis Category:Saskatchewan Roughriders players
title: Eddie Davis (Canadian football)
